name: FoodBox
0:
”Alexa, ask Food Box about apple”
”Alexa, open Food Box and tell me about apple”
”Alexa, open Food Box and apple”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food box
des:
The Food Box skill is designed to help you quickly check the important facts about food, such as its macro ratios, health benefits and its potential side effects (cited from books, research paper, or other academic sources). 

Simply ask: "Tell me about ...", such as "Tell me about apple", the skill will respond with: "One average-sized Apple, roughly 182g, contains around 95 calories, 0.5g of protein, 0.3g of fat, and 25g of carbohydrates. one average-sized Apple contains about 19g of sugar, in other words, around 10 percent of every apple is made up of sugar. apple is medium in sugar compared to other fruits."

Studies have shown that many of health issues are the results of personal imbalances. Each food has its unique nutritional ratios, some contain more sugar, some contain less calories, some contain more starchy carbohydrates, etc. Research has shown marked improvements (in weight loss, energy increase, building muscle, joints pain elimination, etc) when individuals make appropriate dietary changes. The skill does not provide any medical advice. But it helps you learn more about our foods.

DISCLAIMER: This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
